code: @Test public void testRouteGroup() {     RouteDefinition definition = context.getRouteDefinition("route-id").     Route route = context.getRoute("route-id").     assertEquals("route-group", definition.getGroup()).     assertEquals("route-group", route.getGroup()). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").routeId("route-id").routeGroup("route-group").to("mock:output").         }     }. }
